name: Being warm when it is cold outside
Being wrapped up in the love of a special woman
Not having to talk for the sake of it
Going to work in shorts and a t-shirt
Terrorising Taiwan on my big red motorcycle
Getting up at 10:00am and going to bed at 3:00am
Giving little things to people to show that you are thinking of them
Getting little things from people when you are not expecting them
Not conforming to other people’s expectations
but I like it all the same)
Knowing that I give more back to the world than I take from it
My mum (who has had to put up with emails for the last 3 years while I’ve been off saving the world)
People who do something courageous (no matter how small) and become a little bit bigger from it.
Rock climbing (although I broke my ankle over 15 months ago and have not walked properly since)
